nodes.text: A Garwian male held the rank of general in the Garwian Unity. The general attempted to manipulate Senior Commander Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Ascendancy into revealing the tactical weaknesses of the Lioaoin Regime by claiming that arriving Lioaoin vessels were attacking Solitair while Thrawn was on the planet with Commodore Ar'alani. Ar'alani, suspicious of the situation, determined what the Garwians were trying to do, preventing Thrawn from providing them with information.
